snippet: The influential music magazine Arthur, which in its earlier incarnation had a circulation of 40,000 as a free publication, will return on newsprint in December at a cost of $5 an issue.
abstract: The influential music magazine Arthur, which in its earlier incarnation had a circulation of 40,000 as a free publication, will return on newsprint in December at a cost of $5 an issue.

headline.main: A Counterculture Totem to Return as a Leaner Magazine
